comment: Nov 2018 w/ Kazi @ East End. expensive. didnt care for it much. pretty average or below. apricot! or nectarine. mesquite. geranium. apple wood. cherry

I've had this in my cabinet since the later 1990s. Light floral nose and light yellow color. Light non-viscous body, sweet grain, fruit, and vanilla in the mouth. light peat. My tastes changed to smokier peatier scotches, hence why I still have this. Clean and easy to drink, a classic highland,  but not particularly memorable.
